Applied AI Summit will give you the tools for your AI journey, 5-7 Feb, London

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: AI, IQPC, London, Summit, UK

The Applied AI Summit 2018 (5-7 Feb, 2018) will give you the tools to start or develop your AI journey. What you learn here, you can implement tomorrow.


Artificial Intelligence is no longer the future, it is here!


For years we've been told that machine learning, cognitive computing and AI will forever alter the way we work and do business. Now, the time has come. 


With so many areas of business being disrupted and driven by AI, we have launched the hottest event on the calendar, showcasing the AI Leaders, practical use studies and disruptive brands shaping the future.


The Applied AI Summit 2018 (5-7 Feb, 2018)  will give you the tools to start or develop your AI journey. What you learn here, you can implement tomorrow, not in years to come!

 

Leading AI Speakers

 

Why is Applied AI Different?

1.     Tangible, real-life use cases that work today, not hypothetical future-gazing of years to come

2.     Absolutely no sales pitches. The stage is clear of vendors, with every session practitioner lead

3.     AI Leaders all on one stage: Deliveroo, Airbnb, BBC, GSK, Expedia, CERN, Rolls-Royce & more

4.     Bleeding-edge tech, including Neural Networks, Deep Learning & Natural Language Processing

5.     More industries sharing more knowledge - Healthcare, Retail, Travel, Insurance, Manufacturing

 

Unique Use Case Studies

  • Monzo Bank's fraud prevention successes with machine learning
  • Great Ormond Street Hospital's cutting-edge R&D on the impact of AI on medicine
  • CNRS reveals the AI elements of the next Large Hadron Collider project
  • Boehringer Ingelheim's Angels Initiative, using AI to save lives 
  • Asos's approach to using deep neural networks to better understand the customer

If you cannot access the agenda, or want any additional information on the Applied AI Summit, reach out via email

Kind Regards,

Joel

 

Joel De Figueiredo

Applied AI Summit 2018 Conference Director

+44 (0) 207 368 9809

enquire@iqpc.co.uk
